availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Richard S. Ratcliffe (Paducah, McCracken County lawyer)

body.p: A Virginia-born lawyer. Residence: Paducah, McCracken County, Kentucky.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McCracken County, Paducah, District 2, p. 154.

Find A Grave, Richard S. Ratcliffe (1817-1878), Find A Grave Memorial # 84326845, Oak Grove Cemetery, Paducah, McCracken County, Kentucky, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=84326845&ref=acom (accessed 12 May 2017).
